name: Box Run (itch) (thatssnappdragonn)
description:
Made for the 20 Second Game Jam.

Get as far as you can in 20 seconds avoiding the purple squares that slow you down. If you get the whole way to the end you get a star :)

Controls: 

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space or Enter to start and restart
  • You can restart at any time during a run
